accounts.create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS accounts ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name TEXT NOT NULL, account_type TEXT NOT NULL, username TEXT NOT NULL, password TEXT NOT NULL, imap_server TEXT, port_number INT, secure BOOLEAN, notification_location TEXT NOT NULL, notification_sound TEXT, working BOOLEAN DEFAULT false NOT NULL, working_reason TEXT, last_checked DATE, active BOOLEAN );
accounts.insert: INSERT INTO accounts ( name, account_type, username, password, imap_server, port_number, secure, notification_location, notification_sound, working, working_reason, last_checked, active ) VALUES ( :name, :account_type, :username, :password, :imap_server, :port_number, :secure, :notification_location, :notification_sound, :working, :working_reason, :last_checked, :active );
accounts.update: UPDATE accounts SET name = :name, account_type = :account_type, username = :username, password = :password, imap_server = :imap_server, port_number = :port_number, secure = :secure, notification_location = :notification_location, notification_sound = :notification_sound, working = :working, working_reason = :working_reason, last_checked = :last_checked, active = :active WHERE id = :account_id;
accounts.updateLastChecked: UPDATE accounts SET working = :working, working_reason = :working_reason, last_checked = :last_checked WHERE id = :account_id;
accounts.selectAll: SELECT * FROM accounts ORDER BY id ASC;
accounts.selectForList: SELECT id, name, account_type, working, active FROM accounts ORDER BY id ASC;
accounts.selectWorkingReason: SELECT working_reason FROM accounts WHERE id = :account_id;

messages.selectByAccountId: SELECT unique_id FROM messages WHERE account_id = :account_id;
